swiftlanguage.title: English (U.S.)
swiftlanguage.author: QuickSupport
swiftlanguage.phrase: If you can't find a solution to your problem in our knowledgebase, you can submit a ticket by selecting the appropriate department below.
Sorry, we encountered a problem (invalid department). Please start over.
If you are reporting a problem, please remember to provide as much information that is relevant to the issue as possible.
Sorry, we encountered a problem while uploading attachments. A possible reason is attachments size exceeding server upload limit.
Sorry, we encountered a problem (invalid department). Please start over.
Sorry, we encountered a problem (invalid ticket type). Please start over.
Invalid ticket priority specified; please start over.
We have received your request and our team will get back to you shortly. You can log in to the helpdesk to review the status of your request, or check your email for further updates.
Unfortunately, we couldn't accept your attachments (either too large or due to file type restrictions): %s
Your feedback is very important to us and will help us improve our customer support experience.
Sorry, we couldn't find the ticket you requested or you do not have permission to view it.
Please complete all required fields before posting a reply.
You have made changes to the ticket's fields. Click on the Save Changes button above to save them.
We've found the following suggested answers and articles from our knowledgebase
You can specify multiple e-mail addressess seperated by a single space or comma, as custom recipients. The recipients will receive ticket updates.
Are you sure you want to execute workflow

Thank you for contacting us. This is an automated response confirming the receipt of your ticket. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible. When replying, please make sure that the ticket ID is kept in the subject so that we can track your replies.
You can check the status of or update this ticket online at:

This message concerns your ticket #%s. We have not heard back from you in %s hours and would like to know if you consider this issue to be resolved. If you have any further questions, simply respond to this email.
Please note that the ticket will automatically be closed within %s hours if we don't hear back. You can check the status of or reply to this ticket online at:
This message is regarding your ticket ID #%s. We are changing the status of this ticket to %s as we have not heard back from you in %s hours.
If you have any further questions then do let us know. You can check the status of or reply to this ticket online at:
We were unable to process your email. You need to have a helpdesk account before you can create tickets using email. You can register yourself on our helpdesk:
Once registered, you will be able to submit tickets simply by contacting us by email. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
Unable to process your email (registration required)
Unable to process your email (account not validated)

We were unable to process your email. Although a helpdesk account exists for your email address, all accounts must be manually approved by an administrator. Until this has been done, you will not be able to send email to the helpdesk.
We were unable to process your email. Although a helpdesk account exists for your email address, the account has not yet been validated.
Once your account has been validated, you will be able to submit tickets simply by sending us an email. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
This email concerns your recent ticket
As part of our commitment to improving your customer support experience, we would like to know how you think we are doing.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey consisting of just a few multiple-choice questions.
It should take you no more than a minute to complete (we promise!).
To take the survey, click on the following link:
Your feedback is very important to us and we really appreciate your time.
Unfortunately, we were unable to process your message into our helpdesk because it was too big. The total message size (including attachments) should be lower than %s kilobytes.
Please resend your message with fewer attachments (you can split up a number of attachments across multiple messages, if you like). We are sorry to inconvenience you!
Your message was not accepted (message size too big) - please resend
Your ticket has not been accepted into the system. Your account is disabled, you are not authorized to create any tickets via email.
Once enabled, you will be able to submit tickets directly by sending us an email. We are sorry for any inconvenience this may have caused.
Disabled User: Unable to create ticket
